title: Rat and rat tat
creator_credit: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre, Ken Turnbull and Ray Cowling
brief_description: A play on the phonic, graphic and semantic relationships of words, designed for children who have already learned basic phonic-graphic correspondences. Includes several methods of blending in the movements of the animated letters. Suitable for upper primary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre, Ken Turnbull and Ray Cowling
